mapper.select: select * from ssf_schema.video_upload where u_id=#{u_id} and v_state = 1;
select * from ssf_schema.video_upload where v_state=1 ORDER BY RANDOM() limit 16;
mapper.insert: insert into ssf_schema.video_upload (v_code, v_name, v_img, c_code, v_length, u_id, v_link) values (#{v_code},#{v_name},#{v_img},#{c_code},#{v_length},#{u_id},#{v_link})
mapper.select: select * from ssf_schema.video_upload where v_state=1 ORDER BY v_views DESC LIMIT 4;
